class pyblox.api.friends.Friends¶

friendList(id)¶

Gets Friend List

Parameters:id (str) – The user’s ID
Returns:Friend list
Return type:List
checkFriendship(id1, id2)¶

Checks whether the 2 users has friendship.

Note

The 2 user ids should be interchangeable

Parameters:
  • id1 (str) – User ID
  • id2 (str) – User ID
Returns:

whether they are friends
Return type:

boolean
checkBestFriendship(id1, id2)¶

Similar to above function , but only for “Best friendship”

Note

The 2 user ids should be interchangeable

Parameters:
  • id1 (str) – User ID
  • id2 (str) – User ID
Returns:

whether they are friends
Return type:

boolean
